tools.goggles: Radiation Goggles allows radiation to become visible, allowing for easier avoidance and potential cleanup.
tools.remote: The CPU remote is a way to control the CPU of a fission reactor at a distance, without having to enter the reactor itself.
tools.geiger: The geiger counter can detect radiation, and will click more intensely as radiation levels rise.
tools.cleanup: The radiation cleaning tool sprays water over an area to wash away radioactive particles, slowly cleaning it of radiation.
